## Gene Details:
- **Gene ID:** [AT3G22470](https://www.arabidopsis.org/locus?name=AT3G22470)
- **Gene Symbol:** <u>PPR3</u>
- **Gene Name:** pentatricopeptide repeat 3
- **Description:**   Pentatricopeptide repeat (PPR) superfamily protein;(source:Araport11)
